definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: I go to help my brother-in-law to buy a new computer this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午，我去幫內弟買了一臺新電腦。

sentences.english: My brother-in-law is a reporter on The New York Times staff.
sentences.chinese: 我的內弟是紐約時報社的記者。
